stepAnswer: Compound Y will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
stepTitle: Two molecules with the same molecular formula (C3H8O) are given below. They have different structural formulas. Which one will have a higher boiling point and why?
choices: Compound X will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
Compound Y will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
Compound X will have higher boiling point because it can form dipole dipole interaction
